.. _apptainer_plugin_list:

apptainer plugin list
---------------------

List installed Apptainer plugins

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'plugin list' command lists the Apptainer plugins installed on the host.

::

  apptainer plugin list [list options...]

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer plugin list
    ENABLED  NAME
        yes  example.org/plugin

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for list

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer plugin <apptainer_plugin>` 	 - Manage Apptainer plugins
